Flux.guidance: Concise paragraph (2-4 sentences) emphasizing mood, motion, and composition. Include camera cues.
Flux.label: Flux
Flux.negative_prompt: flat lighting, static, dull colors, artifacting

HiDream.guidance: Whimsical paragraph (3-4 sentences) with dreamlike qualities, textures, and fantastical details.
HiDream.label: HiDream
HiDream.negative_prompt: mundane, low detail, flat shadows, inconsistent perspective

Qwen.guidance: Semicolon-separated clauses: appearance; outfit; pose; environment; lighting; camera.
Qwen.label: Qwen
Qwen.negative_prompt: noise, bad hands, unbalanced composition, low detail

SD.guidance: Single line, comma-separated tags. Order: subject, outfit, pose, environment, lighting, camera, style.
SD.label: Stable Diffusion 1.x
SD.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted anatomy, extra limbs, cropped, watermark

SDXL.guidance: Single detailed paragraph (3-5 sentences). Start with subject description, add styling/outfit, environment, lighting, camera angle.
SDXL.label: Stable Diffusion XL
SDXL.negative_prompt: grainy, lowres, oversaturated, deformed, bad proportions, text artifacts

SDXL-Turbo.guidance: Two brisk imperative sentences. Line 1: subject + outfit + action. Line 2: environment + lighting + camera cue.
SDXL-Turbo.label: SDXL Turbo
SDXL-Turbo.negative_prompt: motion blur, mushy textures, low contrast, clip errors, warped limbs

Juggernaut.guidance: Photorealistic paragraph highlighting skin texture, fabric detail, lens type, and lighting falloff. Mention post-processing look.
Juggernaut.label: Juggernaut XL
Juggernaut.negative_prompt: plastic skin, cartoonish, dull eyes, blown highlights, harsh artifacts

RealVis.guidance: Structured tri-sentence format: (1) subject + wardrobe; (2) environment + atmosphere; (3) camera metadata + color grading.
RealVis.label: RealVis XL
RealVis.negative_prompt: uncanny valley, smeared textures, chromatic noise, awkward pose
